member.name: TOOLBARITEM
member.summary: Deprecated. Data used in , , and to define a toolbar item.

member.name: TOOLBARITEM.ptbar
member.summary: The of the item's particular toolbar.

member.name: TOOLBARITEM.rcBorderTool
member.summary: A BORDERWIDTHS structure that contains the dimensions of the item, including its borders.

member.name: TOOLBARITEM.pwszItem
member.summary: A pointer to a buffer that contains the name of the toolbar item as a Unicode string.

member.name: TOOLBARITEM.fShow
member.summary: TRUE if the toolbar item is currently visible; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: TOOLBARITEM.hMon
member.summary: The handle of the monitor on which the toolbar item appears.
